content:
Worlds iVue is an easy-to-use platform combining augmented reality and drone technology, enabling users to control iVue Robotics products like OmniBot Air for missions like aerial imaging and cargo delivery as well as view media content, including job opportunities and geo-located media content produced from iVue Media orders. With powerful features, like real-time mapping and 3D digital object overlay, Worlds iVue offers a unique value proposition for a range of industries beyond aerial photography and videography, such as surveying, construction, and agriculture.

Describe how Worlds iVue can be built with Cesium.
